

For each of the following statements, either prove it is true or give a
counterexample.<br>

1.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(b {{\,|\,}}a, c)$, then
    $P(a {{\,|\,}}c) = P(b {{\,|\,}}c)$ <br>

2.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(a)$, then $P(b {{\,|\,}}c) = P(b)$ <br>

3.  If $P(a {{\,|\,}}b) = P(a)$, then
    $P(a {{\,|\,}}b, c) = P(a {{\,|\,}}c)$<br>
